name: The Real Raid of Area 51
description:
Farmer Frank swore he saw a UFO, but became a laughing stock of his little local town. This set the man off, and on a search for a real alien, eventually stumbling across Area 51.

With his trusty shotgun and big gut, he's determined to go find an alien and prove he was right!

Controls - WASD for movement. Left click for shooting. R for reload.
